definition: a bloody nose and a swollen face/badly battered
nose
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
face/CL:張|张[zhang1],個|个[ge4]
to swell/swelling/swollen

sentences.english: The policeman beat the thief black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 警察把那小偷打得鼻青脸肿。

sentences.english: Peter got black eyes in the fight with the rascals.
sentences.chinese: 彼特和流氓大家弄得鼻青脸肿。

sentences.english: Sunday morning, we come home beat up and sleep all afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 礼拜天早上，我们鼻青脸肿地回家然后睡一个下午。

sentences.english: So now he’s indeed in the hospital, with a swollen, unrecognizable head.
sentences.chinese: 所以现在，他躺在医院里，鼻青脸肿，面目全非。

sentences.english: I will beat you black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 我要把你打得鼻青脸肿。

sentences.english: You fell off. First time you ice skated you sucked.
sentences.chinese: 第一次滑冰的时候你照样菜，更是跌的鼻青脸肿。

sentences.english: I have taken a lot of punches and am bruised and bloodied.
sentences.chinese: 可以说我在市场里已挨了无数胖揍，鼻青脸肿了。

sentences.english: On the side of a distant rural road, a bruised and bloodied Nick cleans his wounds.
sentences.chinese: 在偏远的郊区路边，鼻青脸肿的Nick清理着伤口。

sentences.english: He was beaten black and blue.
I soon became black and blue and lost my consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 我很快就被揍得鼻青脸肿并失去了知觉。

definition: a black eye (idiom); serious injury to the face/fig. a setback/a defeat
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
bruise
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
to be looking for one's teeth all over the floor/(fig.) to get beaten up badly/to beat the crap out of (sb)
flesh lacerated from corporal punishment (idiom)
covered all over with cuts and bruises/beaten black and blue/be a mass of bruises
to beat up/to break to pieces
half dead (of torment, hunger, tiredness etc)/(tired) to death/(terrified) out of one's wits/(beaten) to within an inch of one's life/(knock) the daylights out of sb
lit. head broken and blood flowing/fig. badly bruised
to piss in one's pants in terror (idiom); scared witless
to kneel and beg forgiveness
to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
to be drenched with blood/dripping blood
to cover one's head and sneak away like a rat (idiom); to flee ignominiously
to be beaten/to take a drubbing/buffeted/knocked about
